pages.text: The Tree Tap is a device that extracts various fluids from logs. The tap block is just a stick that protrudes from a log. Right click with an empty bucket to hang it on the tap. A tap with a bucket will eventually fill with liquid and can be retrieved by right clicking. The extracted fluid is defined by the group of #rankine:logs_* tags.
The tap operates on random ticks. By default it will extract every 3 ticks, but this can be adjusted in the config. Tree taps will not work if there is another one in any adjacent block.
Water can be extracted from the three varieties of birch.
Lava can be extracted from the nether trees.
Latex can be extracted from sharinga trees.
Maple sap can be extracted from maple trees.
Jugalone can be extracted from black walnut trees.
Sap can be extracted from any other deciduous tree.
Resin can be extracted from any other coniferous tree.
